title: House panel votes to name Kennedy Center opera house for Melania Trump
shortDescription: A key House panel voted to name the Kennedy Center opera house after first lady Melania Trump.

title: DeSantis eyes new map as Trump pushes GOP states to redraw
shortDescription: With one redistricting win in the bag, could Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis go for more?

title: Trump announces trade deal with Philippines and 19% tariff
shortDescription: The deal was announced after President Ferdinand Marcos met with Trump, ahead of an Aug.1 tariffs deadline.

title: Trump takes US out of UNESCO
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has withdrawn the U.S. from the culture and education agency UNESCO.

title: Trump keeps GOP in a pickle on Epstein
shortDescription: Drama over Jeffrey Epstein continues to plague lawmakers as they prep for August recess and an opportunity to reconnect in person with constituents.

title: Donald Trump floats eliminating this tax on home sales
shortDescription: “We are thinking about no tax on capital gains on houses,” Trump said during an Oval Office meeting with the president of the Philippines.

title: Who is Bryan Kohberger? Trump hopes judge in his case requires motive
shortDescription: President Trump said he wants the judge in the criminal case of Bryan Kohberger to ask for a motive. He will be sentenced for killing 4 Idaho students

title: 'Flood' of ICE agents coming to cities run by Democrats | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A former Louisville police officer has been sentenced to 33 months in prison for violating the civil rights of Breonna Taylor.

title: Trump withdraws from UNESCO again as White House slams 'woke' program
shortDescription: One of the United Nations' UNESCO program missions is the World Heritage program, which protects historic and cultural sites.

title: Top Trump officials' stock sales clustered before tariff news
shortDescription: Stock sales by top officials clustered before Trump's major tariff announcements, according to a USA TODAY analysis of transaction forms.

title: Judges block Trump policies through new routes. Here's how
shortDescription: Trump celebrated when the Supreme Court limited nationwide blocks on his policies, but judges are finding other ways to hinder his priorities.

title: Putin stalls. Trump shifts. Ukraine targets Moscow. Latest on the war.
shortDescription: Russian President Vladimir Putin is stalling over a ceasefire. Meanwhile, Trump has changed his mind about sending weapons to Ukraine.

title: Trump 'serious' about Washington Commanders threat, White House says
shortDescription: President Trump isn't kidding around with his new threat to the NFL's Washington Commanders, the White House says.

title: MLK files released. Why is King’s family unhappy with Trump’s move?
shortDescription: The National Archives released over 240,000 pages of records in accordance with an executive order from January.
